text: $GOOGL says the Pentagon‚Äôs Chief Digital & AI Office has selected Gemini for Government as the first enterprise AI on its GenAI platform.
Polymarket is pricing about a 20% chance of 4 cuts which fits a JOLTS report that still shows a firm labor market & little pressure for aggressive easing.

$GOOGL Gemini is starting to win engagement.

The AI economy will be shaped by who can hold user attention long enough to turn AI usage into everyday habit because that is what ultimately drives monetization.

Higher minutes per visit indicate Gemini is building more sustained interaction loops which raises the probability that users default to Google‚Äôs model across Search, Workspace, Android & the broader ecosystem.

$IREN is building Horizon with 750 miles of high-bandwidth fiber & two 100MW GPU superclusters.

AI demand is scaling faster than traditional build timelines & IREN is one of the few operators that can deliver the power-secured capacity at the speed this cycle now requires.
$META COULD DROP ITS NEW AI ‚ÄòAVOCADO‚Äô MODEL IN Q1
$MSFT is putting ~$18B into India (its largest investment in Asia) to build out the country‚Äôs AI infrastructure & talent base.

It‚Äôs always funny hearing people call $NVDA overvalued.

We‚Äôre watching the core compute engine of the new digital economy trade below $WMT & $COST while it supplies the largest infra buildout since the internet.

And this is before physical AI even shows up in the numbers.

Tiger Global says $GOOGL Waymo is now running 450k paid rides per week which is almost double April‚Äôs 250k as it expands onto freeways and into new cities.

They argue that surge is justified because Waymo is already 10x safer than human drivers.

When every model, every framework, every data-center plan & every hyperscaler roadmap is built around $NVDA chips and software then the jump from 27% to 86% isn‚Äôt surprising. 

That‚Äôs what happens when an entire industry standardizes on you.

$GOOGL is using Gemini to meter every AI interaction across its ecosystem by letting it monetize intelligence through Search, Android, YouTube & Cloud.

With billions of daily touchpoints, Google can turn AI usage into a recurring revenue engine.

$GOOGL & $AAPL are partnering to make switching between iPhone &Android smoother.

The next phase of AI (agents, multimodal assistants, on-device inference) requires users to be on newer hardware so reducing switching friction helps accelerate refresh cycles.

If switching stays painful then people keep old phones longer which slows down how fast Apple & Google can push AI agents to billions of users at scale.

üì∫ $TSLA & $AAPL: SAME PLAYBOOK‚ÄîRESPECT THE PIVOT OR GET HURT

Tesla is testing support at the 8-day, while Apple just showed what happens when a key pivot fails.

Both setups highlight the same lesson: respect the levels, manage size, and avoid getting opinionated when price stops cooperating.

üì∫ INSIDE-DAY SETUP AHEAD OF FOMC: KEY LEVELS TO WATCH

The market is tightening ahead of the FOMC, and this pause is healthy as long as $SPY & $QQQ hold their inside-day ranges and key support levels.

The goal now is to avoid over-trading, protect gains, and let the Fed‚Äôs decision dictate the next directional move.
